data.title: Dean Clark on LinkedIn: Great idea.
data.text:
Big thanks to Paul Gray for finishing this exhibition pump we will be sending over to our friends at Harben Inc. Jennifer Pederson, CPA and Barry Pidgeon will be on the stand at the WJTA conference and expo at the end of October where they will be showing off this beauty. At the show they will be showing various products to suit both the industrial and oil and gas market. Not just the Harben pump. Flowplant Group Limited have been producting these pumps for many years and it really pleases me when we are able to get the pump in front of new people. As always, if you need any information on the products from Flowplant Group Limited and Harben Inc, then drop me a line and I will put you in contact with the right person. #waterjetting #processpumps #industry

Trust in your Journey and believe in the Magic of TIMING. ✍️Often in life, we find ourselves chasing opportunities or striving for a life we've always dreamt of. 🙃But sometimes, despite our best efforts, things don't always go as planned. 🏃♂️Remember, just as the universe follows a rhythm, our lives too have their own pace. Whether you're on a JOB hunt or navigating the twists and turns of LIFE, have faith that when the time is right, everything will fall into place. ♎It's a balance of Patience, Perseverance, and Trust in the journey. ➡️Patience is not about doing nothing; it's about knowing when to act. It's about recognizing that not all opportunities are the right opportunities. 🎯Sometimes we're so eager to move forward that we don't wait for the right moment or the right fit. ⏲️When you're open to different paths and trust that the right one will present itself, you'll be surprised at how often it actually does. 🌟Just as the right job awaits the right candidate, the right moments in life await the right time. 📌The next time you find yourself in a sea of uncertainty, remember that it's all a part of the plan. When the TIME is right, everything will indeed fall into place. Keep moving, keep trying, and trust the process!! Video: #socialmedia Write-up: Vipin Gautam #mindset #personaldevelopment #jobinterviews #india #opportunities #whatinspiresme

Harben Pumps, renowned, reliable and robust! Did you know that the renowned Harben Pump, a true engineering marvel, is proudly manufactured right here in the UK by Flowplant Group Ltd? 🏭 Find out more about some of the remarkable benefits that make the Harben Pump stand out in the crowd: 👉 Ability to Run Dry: Harben pumps, exhibit the remarkable capability to operate indefinitely without water (can run dry). Even when pushed to maximum power for extended periods, these pumps remain undamaged. 👉 Versatile Fluid Compatibility: From fresh water to sea water, the Harben Pump effortlessly handles a variety of fluids, making it an ideal choice for diverse applications. 👉 Solids Handling: With an impressive 150-micron tolerance, the Harben Pump is your ultimate solution for pumping fluids with solids and debris. 👉 Robust Reliability: Built to last, the Harben Pump's durability stems from its extraordinary dry-running ability, versatility, and impeccable engineering. When you choose the Harben Pump, you're not just investing in cutting-edge design – you're choosing British excellence, precision-engineered by Flowplant Group Ltd. Experience the power, versatility, and reliability first hand. Give the team a call today to find out more on 01722 325424 or email sales@flowplant.com. #HarbenPump #EngineeringExcellence #BritishManufacturing #FlowplantProud #Flowplant

Did you catch our recent appearance on the BBC News at 6pm on Friday? 📰 Flowplant on screen, discussing the current economic landscape for UK businesses. Our Group Managing Director, Steve Smith, was interviewed, sharing some valuable insights on the topic. 📺 🎥 Behind the Scenes: Having the film crew on-site was a great experience, shedding some light on the inner workings of Flowplant. The interview with Steve, our Group Managing Director, gave a brief glimpse into our expertise and commitment to the industry. 📈 Economic Insights: The feature delved into the economic challenges and opportunities faced by businesses in the UK. Steve's interview offered a unique perspective, reflecting on the challenges we face to stay ahead in a dynamic business environment. 📹 Catch a Glimpse: In case you missed it, here's a clip from the segment where you can witness Steve in action! Watch the snippet now and get a glimpse into Flowplant's engagement with national news. #BBCNewsFeature #IndustryInsights #FlowplantInAction #Flowplant #ukeconomy #ukmanufacturing
